coredata.dc:title: dictyBase - A Dictyostelium bioinformatics resource update

abstract.ce:para: dictyBase (http://dictybase.org) is the model organism database for Dictyostelium discoideum. It houses the complete genome sequence, ESTs and the entire body of literature relevant to Dictyostelium. This information is curated to provide accurate gene models and functional annotations, with the goal of fully annotating the genome. This dictyBase update describes the annotations and features implemented since 2006, including improved strain and phenotype representation, integration of predicted transcriptional regulatory elements, protein domain information, biochemical pathways, improved searching and a wiki tool that allows members of the research community to provide annotations. © 2008 The Author(s).

xocs:funding.xocs:funding-agency: Javna Agencija za Raziskovalno Dejavnost RS

xocs:funding-list.xocs:funding-text: National Institutes of Health (GM64426 and HG0022) (R.L.C.), (P01-HD39691) (T.C., B.Z., G.S.) and the Slovenian Research Agency (P2-0209, J2-9699) (T.C., B.Z.) (partial). Funding for open access charge: National Institutes of Health.

abstract.ce:para: dictyBase (http://dictybase.org) is the model organism database for Dictyostelium discoideum. It houses the complete genome sequence, ESTs and the entire body of literature relevant to Dictyostelium. This information is curated to provide accurate gene models and functional annotations, with the goal of fully annotating the genome. This dictyBase update describes the annotations and features implemented since 2006, including improved strain and phenotype representation, integration of predicted transcriptional regulatory elements, protein domain information, biochemical pathways, improved searching and a wiki tool that allows members of the research community to provide annotations. © 2008 The Author(s).
